Title: Allows for in-state suppliers to receive preference in certain situations when the state is awarding contracts
Summary: Allows for in-state suppliers to receive preference in certain situations when the state is awarding contracts.
LawCode: Add ยง149, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to allowing for in-state suppliers to receive preference in certain situations when the state is awarding contracts
